title: Chicken Stew
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 chicken legs or breasts', '1 large onion, peeled, halved and sliced', '4 stalks celery, chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and thickly chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped or pressed', '120ml white wine or chicken stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes or punnet cherry tomatoes or 6 fresh tomatoes, chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', 'Pinch salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste']
